00036 namespace TREX {
00037   namespace transaction {
00038 
00039     template<class Iter>
00040     size_t graph::add_reactors(Iter from, Iter to) {
00041       graph *me = this;
00042       typename xml_factory::iter_traits<Iter>::type
00043        it = xml_factory::iter_traits<Iter>::build(from, me);
00044       boost::shared_ptr<TeleoReactor> reactor;
00045       size_t count = 0;
00046       
00047       while( m_factory->iter_produce(it, to, reactor) ) {
00048        std::pair<details::reactor_set::iterator, bool>
00049          ret = m_reactors.insert(reactor);
00050        if( ret.second )
00051          syslog()<<"Reactor \""<<reactor->getName()<<"\" created.";
00052        else 
00053          throw MultipleReactors(*this, **(ret.first));
00054        ++count;
00055       }
00056       return count;
00057     }
00058 
00059   }  
00060 }
